original_title: 農家の嫁 桐島綾子
overview: Bank worker Ayumi (Kirishima Ayako) wants to leave Tokyo and live in a rural area. Ashiirekon is a trial of married life to see if the bride can endure the harsh farm work. You are not allowed to have sex with the betrothed until after the trial period is over and you give them a formal congratulatory message. ] However, Ayumi ends up being cuckolded by a man because of the village tradition of getting married.
title: Farmer's Bride
